alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 6:32AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of northern Litchfield and southeastern Berkshire Counties through 715 AM EST... At 631 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers with gusty winds along a line extending from near East Windsor to near Otis to Sharon. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and areas of poor drainage. Locations impacted include... Torrington, New Hartford, Sharon, Becket, Norfolk, Otis, Litchfield, Canaan, Sandisfield, Northwest Harwinton, New Hartford Center, Falls Village, Cornwall Bridge, Winsted, Harwinton, Goshen, New Marlborough, Colebrook, Cornwall and Peru. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
